mapper.select: select * from board order by gid desc, seq limit #{start}, #{limit}
mapper.insert:
select max(id) + 1 from board
insert into board (title, pname, pw, content, upfile, reg_date, gid, cnt, seq, lev) values (#{title},#{pname},#{pw},#{content},#{upfile},sysdate(),#{gid},-1,0,0)
mapper.delete: delete from board where id = #{id} and pw = #{pw}
mapper.update: update board set cnt = cnt+1 where id = #{id}
